column5: Part 2 I said I would be pouting if we didn't get some fish this trip. While the water was still 51 degrees, the weather stabilized for a few days and it seems timing is everything with these elusive fish. This trip, the fish were active and we released a half dozen and lost several others.  They averaged between 19" to 22". One was a real 'football'  shape with a girth over 14. Alan
Those are some real beauties!!! congrats...
Very impressive brookies! Thanks for sharing.
Gorgeous fish!  I am curious, where they all fly-caught? Thanks
